reviewText: I am biased, but... Disc One of this documentary set includes HD, high-quality re-enactment films about different civil war battles as well as docu-drama overviews of the Confederate Army of Northern Virginia and the northern Army of the Potomac.  Perfect for the history or Civil War buff and a fantastic resource for teachers at all levels of instruction.  The other two discs contain older documentaries re-packaged from earlier releases, but for the price, this set is worth every penny for Disc One alone.
summary: Well worth the price, two different filmmakers...
Title: The Civil War: Commemorative Documentary Collection

reviewText: I have not watched all the film as yet but what I have viewed so far has met exactly with what I expected.Great price,great film and so well done too.Dvds came quickly and everything in great shape.Being a history buff all my life with dozens,possibly hundreds of dvds relating to history this one is in my top ten list.Jon
Title: The Civil War: Commemorative Documentary Collection

reviewText: This movie is exciting from beginning to end.  I would recommend it to anyone.  The realism is great.  Action packed.
Title: The Civil War: Commemorative Documentary Collection

reviewText: This 3 dvd set is an excellent, overall history of this tragic time. There are many great battle scenes and dramatic pieces throughout this 8 hour set.
Title: The Civil War: Commemorative Documentary Collection

reviewText: very well done historical documentary on the civil war and iis a very good addition to my collection.  I can't think of anything that I didn't like about this one.

reviewText: this is a great set of documentary films and gives great detail and shares some fantastic photos and stories as well as letter reading to bring you into the moment of american history.  Gritty.
